Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near 115th/Spaulding
ShortDescription: Southbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/66th

#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 65th, Morgan, 63rd and Halsted: due to, a festival near Halsted/66th.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Kenmore
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Ashland, Addison, Clark & Belmont, due to police activity near Belmont/Kenmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Ashland, Addison, Clark then resume their normal route on Belmont, due to police activity near Belmont/Kenmore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Lowe
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, & 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Lowe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, then resume their normal route on 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Lowe.
